card.name: Doc Ock, Evil Inventor
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target noncreature artifact you control becomes an 8/8 Robot Villain artifact creature in addition to its other types.

card.name: Grasping Tentacles
card.text: Target opponent mills eight cards. You may put an artifact card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Green Goblin, Nemesis
card.text: Flying Whenever you discard a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on target Goblin you control. Whenever you discard a land card, create a tapped Treasure token.

card.name: Pumpkin Bombs
card.text: {T}, Discard two cards: Draw three cards, then put a fuse counter on this artifact. It deals damage equal to the number of fuse counters on it to target opponent. They gain control of this artifact.

card.name: Sensational Spider-Man
card.text: Whenever Sensational Spider-Man attacks, tap target creature defending player controls and put a stun counter on it. Then you may remove up to three stun counters from among all permanents. Draw cards equal to the number of stun counters removed this way.

card.name: Venom, Deadly Devourer
card.text: Vigilance, menace {3}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. When you do, put X +1/+1 counters on target Symbiote, where X is the exiled card's toughness.

card.name: Celes, Rune Knight
card.text: When Celes enters, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards plus one. Whenever one or more other creatures you control enter, if one or more of them entered from a graveyard or was cast from a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Celes, Rune Knight
card.text: When Celes enters, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards plus one. Whenever one or more other creatures you control enter, if one or more of them entered from a graveyard or was cast from a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Cloud, Ex-SOLDIER
card.text: Haste When Cloud enters, attach up to one target Equipment you control to it. Whenever Cloud attacks, draw a card for each equipped attacking creature you control. Then if Cloud has power 7 or greater, create two Treasure tokens.

card.name: Cloud, Ex-SOLDIER
card.text: Haste When Cloud enters, attach up to one target Equipment you control to it. Whenever Cloud attacks, draw a card for each equipped attacking creature you control. Then if Cloud has power 7 or greater, create two Treasure tokens.

card.text: Haste When Cloud enters, attach up to one target Equipment you control to it. Whenever Cloud attacks, draw a card for each equipped attacking creature you control. Then if Cloud has power 7 or greater, create two Treasure tokens.

card.name: Terra, Herald of Hope
card.text: Trance — At the beginning of combat on your turn, mill two cards. Terra gains flying until end of turn. Whenever Terra deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}. When you do, return target creature card with power 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Tidus, Yuna's Guardian
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may move a counter from target creature you control onto a second target creature you control. Cheer — Whenever one or more creatures you control with counters on them deal combat damage to a player, you may draw a card and proliferate. Do this only once each turn.

card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may move a counter from target creature you control onto a second target creature you control. Cheer — Whenever one or more creatures you control with counters on them deal combat damage to a player, you may draw a card and proliferate. Do this only once each turn.

Cheer — Whenever one or more creatures you control with counters on them deal combat damage to a player, you may draw a card and proliferate. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Tifa, Martial Artist
card.text: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.) Whenever one or more creatures you control with power 7 or greater deal combat damage to a player, untap all creatures you control. If it's the first combat phase of your turn, there is an additional combat phase after this phase.

card.name: Tifa, Martial Artist
card.text: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.) Whenever one or more creatures you control with power 7 or greater deal combat damage to a player, untap all creatures you control. If it's the first combat phase of your turn, there is an additional combat phase after this phase.

card.name: Y'shtola, Night's Blessed
card.text: Vigilance At the beginning of each end step, if a player lost 4 or more life this turn, you draw a card. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell with mana value 3 or greater, Y'shtola deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Y'shtola, Night's Blessed
card.text: Vigilance At the beginning of each end step, if a player lost 4 or more life this turn, you draw a card. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell with mana value 3 or greater, Y'shtola deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Y'shtola, Night's Blessed

card.name: "Shantotto"
card.text: Whenever you cast a non-creature spell, "Shantotto" gets +X/+0 until end of turn where X is the amount of mana spent to cast that spell. If X is 4 or greater, draw a card.

card.name: Arcane Denial
card.text: Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Cecil, Dark Knight
card.text: Deathtouch Darkness — Whenever Cecil deals damage, you lose that much life. Then if your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, untap Cecil and transform it.

card.name: Cecil, Redeemed Paladin
card.text: Lifelink Protect — Whenever Cecil attacks, other attacking creatures gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Cloud, Planet's Champion
card.text: During your turn, as long as Cloud is equipped, it has double strike and indestructible. (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this creature.) Equip abilities you activate that target Cloud cost {2} less to activate.

card.name: Emet-Selch, Unsundered
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Emet-Selch enters or attacks, draw a card, then discard a card. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are fourteen or more cards in your graveyard, you may transform Emet-Selch.

card.name: Hades, Sorcerer of Eld
card.text: Vigilance Echo of the Lost — During your turn, you may play cards from your graveyard. If a card or token would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.text: Vigilance Echo of the Lost — During your turn, you may play cards from your graveyard. If a card or token would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: Force of Negation
card.text: If it's not your turn, you may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target noncreature spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Garland, Knight of Cornelia
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) {3}{B}{B}{R}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield transformed. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Chaos, the Endless
card.text: Flying When Chaos dies, put it on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Garland, Knight of Cornelia
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) {3}{B}{B}{R}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield transformed. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Chaos, the Endless
card.text: Flying When Chaos dies, put it on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Gladiolus Amicitia
card.text: When Gladiolus Amicitia enters, search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, another target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Jumbo Cactuar
card.text: 10,000 Needles — Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +9999/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Jumbo Cactuar
card.text: 10,000 Needles — Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +9999/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Sazh's Chocobo
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Sephiroth, Planet's Heir
card.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) When Sephiroth enters, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn. Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sephiroth.

card.name: Sidequest: Catch a Fish
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's an artifact or creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you put a card into your hand this way, create a Food token and transform this enchantment.

card.name: Cooking Campsite
card.text: {T}: Add {W}. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Sin, Spira's Punishment
card.text: Flying Whenever Sin enters or attacks, exile a permanent card from your graveyard at random, then create a tapped token that's a copy of that card. If the exiled card is a land card, repeat this process.

card.name: Sin, Spira's Punishment
card.text: Flying Whenever Sin enters or attacks, exile a permanent card from your graveyard at random, then create a tapped token that's a copy of that card. If the exiled card is a land card, repeat this process.

card.name: Sin, Spira's Punishment
card.text: Flying Whenever Sin enters or attacks, exile a permanent card from your graveyard at random, then create a tapped token that's a copy of that card. If the exiled card is a land card, repeat this process.

card.name: Stiltzkin, Moogle Merchant
card.text: Lifelink {2}, {T}: Target opponent gains control of another target permanent you control. If they do, you draw a card.

card.name: Stiltzkin, Moogle Merchant
card.text: Lifelink {2}, {T}: Target opponent gains control of another target permanent you control. If they do, you draw a card.

card.name: Summon: Shiva
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Heavenly Strike — Tap target creature an opponent controls. Put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.) III — Diamond Dust — Draw a card for each tapped creature your opponents control.

card.name: Summon: Shiva
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Heavenly Strike — Tap target creature an opponent controls. Put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.) III — Diamond Dust — Draw a card for each tapped creature your opponents control.

card.name: Tonberry
card.text: This creature enters tapped with a stun counter on it. (If it would become untapped, remove a stun counter from it instead.) Chef's Knife — During your turn, this creature has first strike and deathtouch.

card.name: Zell Dincht
card.text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns. Zell Dincht gets +1/+0 for each land you control. At the beginning of your end step, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
